articles.author: Emma Whitford
articles.title: These 26 Rich Private Colleges Just Got A Tax Cut From Republicans - Forbes
articles.description: While 11 schools, including Princeton, MIT, Yale and Harvard. were hit with a higher tax on their endowments, Congress exempted wealthy small schools, including Swarthmore, Amherst, Hillsdale and CalTech, from the levy.
